A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’ve read so many bad reviews on this movie\, so I went in not planning on being impressed. I’m not sure we are talking about the same movie. Star Wars right? What a great movie. I was not disappointed at all. It was a great ride all the way through. Sure\, there were a few silly things\, and some other things that were a little off topic\, but overall it was well worth the price of admission.
